s2.name: OSGi support and administration tool
s2.p: Work in progress around the OSGi support and numerous administration functions. An high level tool is in specification, it will allow to configure, deploy, monitor and control large Joram's configuration.

s2.name: AMQP
s2.p: Thank's to third party users, the Joram team should announce soon the support of AMQP in Joram. It will allow the use of Joram from many client interfaces and languages.

s2.name: Security model
s2.p: A new security implementation with authentication based on JAAS LoginModule and User/Role access control rights.
